casebody.data:
RECOVERY ALLIANCE, INC. v. DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE SERVICES, DIVISION OF SPECIAL REVENUE (14669)

Foti, Landau and Daly, Js.

Argued November 3 decision released November 28, 1995 *925Francis W. Benner, for the appellant (plaintiff). Richard M. Sheridan, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellee (defendant). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
